metadata.title: CVE-2024-46756 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:hwmon: (w83627ehf) Fix underflows seen when writing limit attributesDIV_ROUND_CLOSEST() after kstrtol() results in an underflow if a largenegative number such as -9223372036854775808 is provided by the user.Fix it by reordering clamp_val() and DIV_ROUND_CLOSEST() operations.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
